# Week 1

---

This week, we wrap up Unit 1 (Introduction to Data) on Monday, work through Unit 2 (Probability and distributions) Tuesday through Thursday, and begin Unit 3 (Foundations for inference) on Friday. We will also have a "data science in action" seminar from Dr. Josh Hewitt. Don't forget to pay attention to what is due each day; in all we will have a seminar reflection, two labs, two performance assesments, and two problem sets due this week.

---
